Class BasicImageMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.CacheMessage
      • core.BasicImageMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICoverMessage, IMessage

    public class BasicImageMessage
extends CacheMessage
implements ICoverMessage
    Represents an image file message, it can be used for message and cover message

    Jaisse Grela
